sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Tab, Nav } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import HeaderTwo from "../../components/common/Header"; import { BreadcrumbBox } from "../../components/common/Breadcrumb"; import FooterTwo from "../../components/FooterTwo"; import { Styles } from "./styles/course"; import Pagination from "../../components/Pagination"; import courseData from "../../data/course/courseDescription.json"; import achievementsData from "../../data/course/achievements.json"; import instructorData from "../../data/course/instructor.json"; // using new structure function CourseDetails(props) { const id = props.match.params.id; const [course, setCourse] = useState(null); const [achievements, setAchievements] = useState([]); const [faculty, setFaculty] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const selectedCourse = courseData.find((course) => course.id === id); setCourse(selectedCourse); const matchedAchievements = achievementsData.find((a) => a.id === id); setAchievements(matchedAchievements ? matchedAchievements.achievements : []); const matchedFaculty = instructorData.find((item) => item.id === id); setFaculty(matchedFaculty ? matchedFaculty.faculty : []); }, [id]); if (!course) { return (

Course not found. Please check your URL or course ID.

); } return (

{course.heading}

Author

{course.authorName}

Durations

3 Years

Overview Faculty Achievements Apply
{/* === Overview Tab === */} {/* ... Keep your overview content here ... */}
Course Description

{course.overview.courseDesc}

 {/* === Faculty Tab (Dynamic) === */}
{faculty.length > 0 ? ( faculty.map((data, i) => (
{data.personName}

{data.personTitle}

)) ) : (

No faculty available for this course.

)}
{/* === Achievements Tab (Dynamic) === */}
Achievements and Awards
{achievements.length > 0 ? ( achievements.map((a, i) => (
{a.name}

{a.title}

{a.description}
)) ) : (

No achievements available for this course.

)} {/* === Apply Tab === */}
Coming soon
); } export default CourseDetails;
